text.div:
SHR DeviceUseStatus Extension

A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about. Generally this will be active or completed.

name: SHR DeviceUseStatus Extension
title: SHR DeviceUseStatus Extension
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about. Generally this will be active or completed.

element.definition: A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about. Generally this will be active or completed.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
Value of extension - may be a resource or one of a constrained set of the data types (see Extensibility in the spec for list).
A code representing the patient or other source's judgment about the state of the device used that this statement is about. Generally this will be active or completed.
